general.name: Aditia Rizky Utama
general.headline: Fullstack Developer & UI/UX designer
about: Hi there! ðŸ‘‹ My name is Aditia Rizky Utama, currently a 7th-semester Informatics Engineering student at Universitas Muria Kudus.

I am passionate about web development, both frontend and backend. My primary stack is React.js and Express.js, but I also have some experience with Laravel, though not extensively. For databases, I usually work with MySQL and PostgreSQL. Currently, I am learning Nest.js and Next.js, and I also have some basic knowledge of SEO.
Outside of programming, I enjoy gaming as part of my daily activities.
